channel.title: 日本語 on constantly walking
channel.description: Recent content in 日本語 on constantly walking

item.title: Shirokuma Cafe
item.description: This classic, mildly absurdist anime series centered on a cafe run by a polar bear has been a big part of my language immersion strategy. As part of this effort I extracted the audio into small chunks and combined it with Japanese subtitles so you can get a combination of listening and reading practice in your browser where a tool like Yomichan or ichi.moe can be used to look up kanji or grammar that you don’t know.
